result.reason: Exporting passwords in clear text is a security risk; adding a warning ensures users are aware before proceeding.
result.approach: In FrmExport.cs, detect when the user selects CSV export. Before executing the export, display a MessageBox warning that passwords will be saved in clear text and require confirmation to proceed.
